A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I almost walked out of this movie.  The plot was poorly executed and at times it seemed like a cheap knock-off/fan film of a StarWars movie.  I am all for changes and new stories/directions\, but had more expectations from Disney since the Marvel Universe is so well executed.  The story here almost felt like it as thrown together in a weekend at a 24hr film festival and edited by a you-tube comedian.   I am really concerned that RJ has been given the next Trilogy\, based on this movie he doesn't seem like a good storyteller.
